attributes.action: The 'Leave' Campaign should not use the NHS logo on their battle bus.
attributes.background:
The 'Leave' Campaign are using the NHS logo on their battle bus together with the misleading statement that the EU costs us £350 million a week and this money should be spent on the NHS.

We ask that NHS England and Parliament take action to have the NHS logo removed at the earliest opportunity.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the Leave campaign, not the Government and Parliament.
